text: hi I'm Vaughn with AWS office meeting
rooms are a significant investment of
time and money for any company of any
size however users often face challenges
using in-room equipment finding and
booking available meeting rooms and any
meetings on time in addition facilities
and IT managers often do not have the
data they need to optimize meeting room
utilization in their office Alexa for
business can help you address these
meeting room challenges and in this
video we're going to show you how you
can deploy Alexa for business in your
meeting rooms and integrate it with
popular conferencing apps and calendar
solutions this allows your employees to
use simple voice commands to start or
end meetings and manage meeting room
bookings let's check it out if a room
has Alexa for business enabled your
employees can check a room's
availability and book it if free they
can say Alexa is this room free it's
available until the end of the day how
long would you like to book it for 30
minutes ok I've booked this room from
now to 12:15 p.m. if they wish to use
the room a little longer they can also
say Alexa extend this meeting
okay I've extended your meeting until
12:30 p.m. when they are ready to start
their meeting Alexa can automate all of
the manual steps such as turning on
screens retrieving conference bridge
information and starting the call to
start their meeting they can just say
Alexa start the meeting do you want to
join the meeting weekly Business Review
yes
[Music]
meeting powered by Amazon chime a new
feature that we recently launched is
instant room booking now when Alexis
starts a meeting it can automatically
book the room for the user if the room
is free Alexa can also perform an
automatic check-in to the meeting room
employees can also just say Alexa
check-in ok you're checked in by having
employees check-in you can reduce how
often your meeting rooms are booked but
not used if a meeting room does not get
checked in to within a chosen grace
period Alexa will remind the employee to
check in this room hasn't been checked
in to and will be released to keep this
room say Alexa check in if check-in
still doesn't occur within a minute
Alexa will use the intelligent room
release feature to automatically free up
the room so it can be used by other
employees this room has been released
now when the meeting event nears
completion Alexa provides employees with
a subtle end of meeting reminders so
they can start wrapping up and leave the
meeting room in time for their next
meeting no more peeking through and
knocking on doors Alexa can provide a
variety of reminders including a simple
time check or a chime sound time check
pretty cool right through all of this
Alexa keeps track of metrics like total
meeting room bookings their duration and
attendance rate you can use this
information to develop a better
understanding of how your meeting rooms
in your office are being used and make
necessary improvements these features
are easily enabled and configured from
the Alexa for business console just go
into a room profile and enable instant
booking intelligent room release
utilization metrics and enemy ting
revisers
as you can see Alexa for business can be
a helpful assistant for your users in
the meeting room and maximize your

visit aws.amazon.com slash Alexa for
